Cleaning up

Once you've finished generating audio, make sure you stop the SongPlayer with a SongPlayer_Stop() call. At that point, the SongPlayer context is no longer needed, so you can delete it:

	SongPlayer_Delete( songPlayerContext );
	songPlayerContext = NULL;

If you're done with the MIDI engine, you can clean that up in the regular way:

	if( spmidiContext != NULL ) SPMIDI_DeleteContext( spmidiContext );
	spmidiContext = NULL;

Finally, you can free up the memory occupied by your image, if you wish.

For an overview of the entire process, refer to the example code /examples/play_song.c.
